income_messages:
From: m**************1@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-19 23:12:25
SUBJECT:   I am MR DAVID MORRIS, Inspec
  I am MR DAVID MORRIS, Inspection Unit Manager United Nations Inspection Agency in Harts-field Jackson International Airport Atlanta, Georgia. During our investigation, I discovered An abandoned shipment through a Diplomat from the United Kingdom which was transferred from JF Kennedy Airport to our facility here in Atlanta, The two consignment boxes are worth $8 million. And I Ascertain you that the consignment is in your name, and you are advised to provide all details for claim, after custom clearance charges are perfected .
Sincerely,
MR DAVID MORRIS
CONTACT........ 
mrdavidmorris001@gmail.com
From: m**************1@gmail.com
To: ri23171@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-20 12:50:24
SUBJECT: Re: I am MR DAVID MORRIS, Inspec
THANKS VERY MUCH FOR THE RECEIPT OF YOUR EMAIL RESPONSE,KINDLY NOTE THAT
YOUR CONSIGNMENT HAS NOT BEEN TAKEN AWAY AND ONLY WHAT IS REQUIRED FROM YOU
IS A CUSTOM CLEARANCE FEE OF $450 ONLY FOR THE RELEASE AND DELIVERY OF YOUR
CONSIGNMENT WITH ALL LEGAL DOCUMENTS INCLUDING DELIVERY TRACKING NUMBER.
From: m**************1@gmail.com
To: ri23171@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-20 21:18:16
SUBJECT: Re: I am MR DAVID MORRIS, Inspec
Please note that the delivery date and address can't be ascertained as of
this moment. You have to send your details for confirmation, and secondly,
the required fee of $550 is required for a custom clearance certificate for
the release and delivery of your consignment to your doorstep. And the
clearance fee should be paid via Western Union, Moneygram or bank to bank
transfer.
Regards
From: m**************1@gmail.com
To: ri23171@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-21 11:38:33
SUBJECT: Re: I am MR DAVID MORRIS, Inspec
Thanks very much for your email, note that the reason for the custom
clearance fee is for the release of your consignment before delivery to
your doorstep.
Although you can pay the fee via money order delivery, Paypal, cash app, or
via purchase of Ebay cards.
Regards

paid via Western Union or MoneyGram or bank to bank transfer.

During our investigation, I discovered An abandoned shipment through a Diplomat from the United Kingdom which was transferred from JF Kennedy Airport to our facility here in Atlanta, The two consignment boxes are worth $8 million. MR DAVID MORRIS
